page.title: 03WEST LULWORTH FIRST SCHOOL 1
page.content: {WEST LULWORTH FIRST SCHOOL}is a small village school on the Dorset coast. It was built in 1860. There are 37 children on roll. (June 1985). We have 2 Full time teachers and 1 Part time teacher, who comes in 2 days a week.We also have 2 Dinner ladies,2 Cleaning ladies, an Infant helper and a Secretary.(All are Part time). Some of the children come from the village,but 70% come from the {GUNNERY SCHOOL,RAC CENTRE, LULWORTH {CAMP.}Most of the children stay for 2 years,which is the usual length of posting for the main Tank Regiment. Some children, whose Fathers are with other Regiments stay for a longer or shorter period depending on the nature of the posting.Nearly all of these children come from Service Schools in Germany.
